comments.body: You need to test return code here since you're not testing the result of the `shell` module but the `rc` of the `rpm` command itself.

For the `shell` module this is the [same thing](https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/devel/lib/ansible/modules/commands/command.py#L241) (`command` module [is used](https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/devel/lib/ansible/plugins/action/shell.py#L18)).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +13,17 @@    that:
        - "yum_result is success"
        - "rpm_result is failed"

# UNINSTALL AGAIN
